meaning_str.bing:
n. 环境；条件；境遇；状况
v. 把…置于某种情况下
网络. 境况；详情；情形

环境；情况；条件；境遇；（尤指）经济状况；物质条件；具体情形；周围情况；事件；事实；详情；客观环境
使处于某种特定的情况之下

1.en: In so doing, one will be able to see lack in all areas of the life dance subside into a dream-come-true circumstance.
1.cn: 这么做，你将能看到生命舞蹈中所有区域的缺乏都将平息而进入梦想成真的环境。

2.en: Circumstance has made it that we are one of the great news sites that's free. And we're going to try to make something of that.
2.cn: 环境决定我们是一家伟大的免费新闻网站。我们决定，努力在免费的基础上发展。

3.en: "It is the kind of jet made to handle this kind of circumstance but there must have been a build-up of circumstances, " he said.
3.cn: “该类飞机的设计可以应付这种环境，但是可能由恶劣环境引发了一系列问题”，他说。

0.en: Give me one circumstance in which that would be useful.
0.cn: 给我举个例子，证明这三面手有用武之地。

1.en: I know that, m'lady, but this is a special circumstance.
1.cn: 我明白，小姐，但眼下情况特殊。

2.en: A regrettable circumstance of war and one we wish not to repeat.
2.cn: 发动战争就会有这种令人遗憾的后果，希望不会再发生这种事了。

3.en: Yeah, well, a circumstance can happen twice and still be special.
3.cn: 是啊，有些情况就算发生两次，仍然可以算作特殊。

4.en: Well, in that circumstance, I think he was more listening to Bruce than myself.
4.cn: 我想在那种情况下，他通常会听布鲁斯的意见而不是我的。

5.en: That day at 5:00, Daisy Fay married Tom Buchanan with more pomp and circumstance than Louisville had ever seen.
5.cn: 那天下午五点，黛西·费与汤姆·布坎南完婚，婚礼排场在路易斯维尔空前绝后。

6.en: Look, just because we took our friend in does not mean that Penny and I are afraid to be alone. Yeah, this is a special circumstance.
6.cn: 就因为我们收留朋友来住并不代表我和佩妮害怕两人独处。没错，这次是特殊情况。

7.en: Here we are again. You know, if you ignore all the pomp and circumstance, the most perverse thing is I actually believe in the presidency.
7.cn: 又是这熟悉的一幕。知道吗，如果你忽略盛大的仪式和场合，最反常的事就是我真的相信总统之位。
